sentences.en: And they pride themselves on the sophistication of their investigative methods.
sentences.cn: 而且他们自豪他们能够使用复杂的研究方法.

sentences.en: Assiduity , responsible, investigative , sociable, open - minded and all - round.
sentences.cn: 勤奋,有责任心,好学,平易近人, 思想开朗, 全面发展.

sentences.en: Duncan Campbell is nationally known for his investigative work.
sentences.cn: 邓肯·坎贝尔因其调查工作闻名全国。

sentences.en: Objective To investigative the effect that Tanreqing injection by fibrobronchoscope treats Acute Pulmonary Abscess.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨痰热清注射液经纤支镜肺泡灌注治疗急性肺脓肿的临床疗效.

sentences.en: Of course, certain folks will rail against this investigative approach.
sentences.cn: 当然, 一些民众会反对这种调查方法.

sentences.en: Others have started investigative reporting projects, many of which are based on university campuses.
sentences.cn: 有些则开始从事调查性报道, 其中许多都把工作地点设在大学校区.

sentences.en: Several investigative teams settled on essentially the same approach.
sentences.cn: 好几个调查组采用了大体相同的方法.

sentences.en: She has already been working in investigative journalism for over ten years.
sentences.cn: 她已经做了十几年的新闻采访工作.

sentences.en: The article was an excellent piece of investigative journalism .
sentences.cn: 这是一篇优秀的调查研究报道。

sentences.en: The city's newspapers still attempt to get down to the nitty gritty of investigative journalism.
sentences.cn: 该市报纸仍在试图厘清调查性新闻的实质。

sentences.en: The influences of iron modulus on the formation kinetics of portland cement clinker have been investigative.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了铝率对硅酸盐水泥熟料形成动力学的影响.

sentences.en: The investigative committee will hold hearings in chicago.
sentences.cn: 调查委员会将在芝加哥举行听证会.

sentences.en: The magazine has long stronghold of investigative reporting in China.
sentences.cn: 《财经》杂志长期以来一直以调查性报告闻名.

sentences.en: The paper has earned respect for its investigative journalism.
sentences.cn: 这份报纸的调查性新闻报道为其赢得了尊敬。

sentences.en: There are important corollaries to the investigative power.
sentences.cn: 调查权力有一些重要的自然结果.

words.tran_cn: 调查的，审查的；研究的，好研究的
研究的；调查的；好调查的

phrases.tran_cn: 调查性新闻；调查性报道

trans.tran_cn: 调查性质的，研究的，爱调查研究的
trans.tran_en: work or activities that involve investigating something
